actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, H. Rept. 93-1230.
Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to correct an inequity in the law relating to the provision of adaptive equipment for automobiles used by disabled veterans and servicemen.

summary.text: States in relation to the provision of adaptive equipment for automobiles used by disabled veterans and servicemen, the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs shall provide and repair such equipment for any automobile or other conveyance which an eligible person may previously or subsequently have acquired. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1902(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to correct an inequity in the law relating to the provision of adaptive equipment for automobiles used by disabled veterans and servicemen.
